author: protolambda
content: Yes, talked and worked with the IPLD folks at devcon, but IPLD does not quite fill the same use case. Although it makes sense to share some terminology / API patterns, SSZ is much more focused on minimal encoding and high-detail merkleization. I.e. SSZ is meant to run on small devices / smart contracts etc., while IPLD is focused more on linking and larger data bodies.
